item.title: Grafitti sticker on first bollard in the Waitrose access road off of Southend Rd, Beckenham, 29th June
item.description:
Grafitti sticker with triangular feet stylised jellyfish, (prolific London grafitti vandal) black, circular about 10cm diameter affixed to black bollard in the access road to Waitrose Beckenham, off of Southend Rd, - first bollard on the Waitrose building side nearest the traffic lights.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southend Road, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Low slung broken shop front canopy, 29th June
item.description:
This is the second time I have had to report this issue, firstly via the telephone and now via email. The shop front canopy is broken beyond repair and has been now for over 6 months. As you walk down the high street it is hanging below 6ft and if it's dark I have walked face first into it and cut my head with sharp corners and screws protuding out from it, I have complained to the shop manager on many occasions now and she is far from concerned as it is not her responsibility. Surely this should be addressed sooner rather than later before someone gets seriously hurt, and maybe even lose a eye. The shop looks like an eyesore with rubbish and old toot lying all over the pavement during daytime. How can this be allowed, lowering the tone of our beautiful high street. Very much look forward to hearing from someone soon as I have now lost my patience with pendant care attitude, and I will take it further if I have to. Yours sincerely Mr A Horton
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 79, Queensway, Poverest, Orpington, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sw1a 2bs, 29th June
item.description:
Bags of rubbish buckets full of glass litter street cleaners cart dumped recycling and general rubbish all mixed up - why us this allowed? take away some bins fine businesses - pubs including Walkers Old Shades and Silver Cross nut mainly Walkers dumping all their waste whenever wherever they like St cleaner never actually cleans anything just dumps their cart next to their bin not to mention urine drugs paraphernalia vomit stains .... please help !
